website_summaries.verdict: Attractive price point, but design and quality control are issues. We recommend light-duty activities with this stroller, such as trips to the store or mall, not jogging on rough trails.
pros: The VIVO Four Wheel pet stroller has three access points and an overhead retractable awning for easy pet handling
Back wheels lock into "park" mode for security
Sturdy construction for off-road conditions on jogging trails
cons: Assembly can be difficult, especially without instructions
Zippers may be poorly constructed or prone to fail
Front-heavy design can lead to unexpected flipping

customer_reviews.title: Can hold burrito bowl and duck with room to spare
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, love the way it looks. My duck loves it. Really good for any small pet.
customer_reviews.author: BT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality stroller for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality stroller for the price! Came fully assembled except for the wheels, which I was able to put on without any trouble at all. Height is perfect for me (I'm 5'6). Now after my little Maltese is done smelling all his smells and stopping every 5 seconds (!) I can have my speed walk! He loves his stroller. Underneath storage is convenient and so is the cup holder, Collapses and sets up easily. Pam P,
customer_reviews.author: pam p

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: i love this stroller . I'm going to use it to take my two female Pomeranians in it Mind you its like a 35 lbs i'm putting and its solid strong. the wheels and breaks are excellent and my dogs just never want to get out of it. they are in love with this stroller too. highly recommand it
customer_reviews.author: KIimberly Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Dixie loves her new ride! 🐶
customer_reviews.text: We bought this stroller so when we take our dog walking and she gets pooped we can still continue to walk . She absolutely loves it! It is a perfect size for her. She is a Lhasa apso mix. She weight about 18lbs and I measured her from head to the beginning of her tail and she is 20 inches long. She has a really long tail which measures at least another 6 inches and she fits perfectly and comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Is all I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: Looked at and read reviews for about 4 months finally made my decision on this Vivo as it had everything I was looking for in that first the price was right for the options, the quality I hoped for and then Very important the reviews. I probably about 100 reviews combined no kidding! The stroller arrived a day earlier than said. And as you can see my Lexie girl is as content as can be, her first ride was as calm and happy as you see her here also. I was surprised at the instant liking she took to the stroller as she can be skittish at times. Only have had for a few days but will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Cat gets out easily
customer_reviews.text: My full grown cat slipped right out of this stroller with it fully zipped up and as secure as it can be as is out of the package. I'm sure it's great for dogs, but do not purchase this for cats.
customer_reviews.author: Tommie G. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: If you want a much better, easier and awesome pet stroller
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the time it will take you to have to ship it back. It came rusted and the wheels didn't work. It was not user friendly to fold to put into car. You get what you pay for. If you want a much better, easier and awesome pet stroller, get the Pet Gear. I paid $160 for it and I use it all the time for my chihuahua. Easy to fold with only one hand and the wheels are constructed much better. Thank you -Jeanette
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Our dog absolutely loves this!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stroller for the money! I have a 5 lb Yorkie and he loves to go for strolls around the neighborhood. He feels safe and secure and ready to take on the world! I open the front flap and he can watch all the squirrels in the yard. It is perfect for family dinners outside. He is happy and safe and can nap or watch the kids play. I would ABSOLUTELY buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Lucy LOVED Walks-Two Weeks Before She Died
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Lucy, my chronic kidney disease cat, at the end of her life. For two weeks, I harnessed and buckled her in. She loved the front view and the back view. She had SO MUCH JOY, even though she declined rapidly those last two weeks. It rolls very easily, with double tires on each front spoke. Very safe, screen, with zipper access. Cup and key holder, and bottom bin are all great perks! I love this stroller!
customer_reviews.author: Arizonadesertgirl

customer_reviews.title: I am really happy with this stroller and with Amazon customer service rep ...
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this stroller and with Amazon customer service rep Josh for fixing the my order and I got my item within a day. The stroller is already comes assemble and just a few stuff that need to be add on yourself which was very simple. It has three net windows top, back and front.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: This pet stroller is too cute to describe.  Chihuahua LOVES IT.
customer_reviews.text: I have a senior 5 lb chihuahua and I adopted a shepherd mix who is 40 lbs and towers over the chihuahua. This adorable stroller puts the chihuahua at eye level and out of harms way of her larger 4-legged sister so she feels much more comfortable. She also sleeps in it at night. I take the chihuahua everywhere with me so this stroller will make a great addition for our outings. It does say it holds up to 30 lbs but that may be pushing it. My maine coon cat is 14 lbs and he takes up the entire compartment with little room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Harpold

customer_reviews.title: space big enough for cat to get out
customer_reviews.text: The stroller is nice/ The wheels are plastic and don't roll on the carpet, however, it did fine on the black top walking around the lake. The only reason I gave it 4 stars was because the sides do have a considerable size gap that if my cat wanted to get out he could most definitely sqeeze through. So I jimmied it up with zip ties by puncturing the black fabric part and wrapping around the rod.
customer_reviews.author: fyergoddess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fur babies.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend who has two little fur babies. I seen her walking the little ones on the hot road, and like to have had a cow. So I ordered this stroller for the two fur babies, they enjoy riding and not burning their feet off. We wear shoes and we can feel the heat from the pavement through the souls, so I can only imagine the feel for an animal. Now the fur babies can going for walks, and not cooking their pads. A must have for fur babies or any other animals that likes to go for walks.
customer_reviews.author: LUVANGEL

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Baby (yep, that’s her name). She’s 10 years old and gets tired more quickly during walks. I figured I’d get this so she could still walk but then ride back home. It’s pretty easy to put together, no issues there. I love the color. I don’t really like the zippers. It’s hard to get them connected and zipped. I do like that it has so many openings though. The pros outweigh the cons so I’m pretty happy. Oh, and I steer it just fine, but my daughter had some issues.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jones

customer_reviews.title: It’s nice to have confidence in the company
customer_reviews.text: I bought the stroller back in early March and it has been excellent. I walk it twice a day for maybe a half a mile with my 15 pound dog. The front wheels are wearing down and now they don’t work as well as they did. They don’t swivel well and freeze up at times. I will try to contact the Manufacture and see what comes next. I will keep you updated. And here is the update... So after talking and sending pictures of the company they sent me new wheels. They work perfectly. It must’ve just been a minor defect on the wheels so I am one happy customer. Thank you for being supportive in the transaction
customer_reviews.author: collegecents

customer_reviews.title: Airline princess loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Why didnt I buy this before?!?!?! Initially I thought this is just ridiculous, but it made traveling through the airport SO MUCH EASIER!!!! Front wheels are a little wobbly but I am comparing it to a childs stroller. It was easy and actually fun to put together. (Wheel washer goes on either side of the wheek BTW) Even though I wish the front wheels were a little bit more sturdy I like it! My 9 pound Lhasa LOVES IT! She tried to get into it to go to sleep while on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Acker

customer_reviews.title: Love your pet!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and while my disabled cockapoo, Missy, hasn't been able to use it yet due to a healing surgery, the construction and ease of opening and closing is great. It's lightweight AND adorable My husband and I are senior citizens and I have rods through out my back so carrying her around would never work. She will now be able to go everywhere we do as normal. So maybe my 250 lb. husband looks crazy wheeling a pink and white polka dot stroller around with a fuzzy white face peeking out. That's the price we pay for loving our pets who always show unconditional love to us.
customer_reviews.author: L Gisone

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Product.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the quality of this product. My dog is 15lbs. I've purchase lesser price Dog carriage on Amazon at much higher quality. I am disabled and this pet stroller will not handle well. Cheaply built. Very disappointed in overall features, MANEUVERABILITY is lousy. I purchased this based upon other reviews and trusted this to be a great product. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: rbettger

customer_reviews.title: Device is alright.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like how important pieces are made of plastic, but it works well. My cat loves it. He likes to walk, but I like long distances, and he gets tired. Amazon shipped this to me used... but they didn't make sure it didn't have all the hardware... I'm upset about that. Contacted main office waiting for the pin clip. Thankfully I had the washers I needed... i have jewelry making tools and had to make my own pin clip out of a string Bobby pin. The manufacturer is sending me the supplies I need.
customer_reviews.author: Mayz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, folds flat for storage, handy zipper for closing animals in if you don't want them to jump out
customer_reviews.text: I live in a retirement community that allows pets - and this really comes in handy. It is easy to assemble, has lots of mesh areas where a pet can see you & won't panic, has a handy double cup holder and storage area below, folds flat for storage (a big plus in a retirement community), and the pets love it. All that's missing when I wheel them out is the royal hand wave. I have bought three of these and have recommended this one to many of my fellow residents. It isn't meant for rough or very uneven terrain, but for my needs, it's perfect. Minimal assembly needed!
customer_reviews.author: Marcheta

customer_reviews.title: A Great Pet Stroller For A Big Cat
customer_reviews.text: I love this pet stroller. It is easy to assemble, light weight, quality made(the mesh is tough too)easy pack-n-go to haul around and the best part: My cat loves it! I never thought I'd be strolling a cat around, but, here I am. It is fun and a pleasure to bring my cat on walks and to parks. I wasnt sure how he would respond with the feeling of being strolled, but he handles it like a champ. He is not an outdoor cat so this stroller takes it up a level of convenience for my cat and for me, for both of us to enjoy the outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: srae29

customer_reviews.title: Rocco loves it!
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is, Wow! Had no idea my J. R. T. would enjoy it this much. Honestly feel this money could NOT have been better spent! Rocco has canine cognitive disorder, or dog dementia. He's also 18 human yrs old. He "panicked" when I left to take the other three dogs on their respective walks. Now, Rocco gets to come too and he loves it! Therefore, I am a very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Miishka S

customer_reviews.title: If you're serious about usage, spend on a better one.
customer_reviews.text: The shelf at the bottom doesn't fully secure at the front, so it might come loose if there is no weight on it. Bigger issue is with the wheels. They don't move freely because of high friction, and the low contact space, with hard plastic, means the front wheels are going to drag as often as they actually roll. Turning the front of the stroller doesn't even get the wheels to fully turn in the right direction even with about 15lbs of dog on board. It's tough to know if your pet will be OK in one of these, so it's hard to justify spending more money on a better one...
customer_reviews.author: SDM

customer_reviews.title: Germ free vet visits!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price! Bought because I wasn't sure my babies would like it & didn't want to invest alot. I am taking them on short rides to get them used to it ..a 10lb and 12lb chihuahua and they fit comfortably...so far it is working great and seems to be pretty solid and stable... assembled quickly with no problems! Happy with purchase...I really looking forward to vet and grooming days so they aren't running around on the germ infested floors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, not easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: In summary, it's good for the price point, and my dog loves it. If I had to do it over again, I would spend more money and purchase a higher quality stroller. - For the price, which is pretty reasonable, this stroller is fine/good. - The main complaint I have about this stroller is that the wheels are very cheap. so it's difficult to maneuver - Reversing and turning it around can be a bit of a pain because the wheels get stuck in the wrong direction often - The stroller is easy to breakdown, fold, and put in the car
customer_reviews.author: Tara J. Scott

customer_reviews.title: I definitely am a little hesitate to keep walking my 7lb Chihuahua as to it could tip easy and she could get hurt but my 10lb dogs ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the front wheels stick sometimes. Seems little cheap, feels very light. I definitely am a little hesitate to keep walking my 7lb Chihuahua as to it could tip easy and she could get hurt but my 10lb dogs love it and jump in and out of it without knocking it over. So I am happy about that. Cup holders don't hold drinks too well. But the basket on bottom is awesome. I will definitely be researching other strollers, I've never bought a dog stroller until now so I'm just now seeing the different things as far as likes dislikes covenants quality of materials of importance safety etc
customer_reviews.author: Meagan brah

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller! My pup recently had major surgery and isn’t supposed to walk yet and this is perfect for getting us out of the house! Both of my small dogs fit comfortably and it’s also nice that I feel they are protected against attack from bigger dogs while inside. It’s sturdy, rolls easy, even over gravel, speed bumps etc. and was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: ElizaAbbey

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking  puppy stroller
customer_reviews.text: Looks like will be a nice stroller . Base seems made well . Wheels could be a little sturdier but I haven’t taken it out on a drive yet. When putting on the two front wheels they need to mark up and down on the part you’re supposed to pop in. I put one on backwards and had hard time fixing it. Looks like putting dog in from the back will be easier than From the top . Looking forward to many walks with our new puppy.
customer_reviews.author: E. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: We have an old chihuahua - struggles to walk so we thought this would be a good way to get him outside for a while each day Pretty solid construction - we put a pillow in the “basket” so he can see out the top Would definitely recommend for older or sick pets
customer_reviews.author: Dav Mag

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it 🤙but wheels wobble if you walk too fast.
customer_reviews.text: This stroller look great. The only problem is the front wheels wobble. You can’t walk really really fast. You have to walk on back two wheels if you need to run fast across the street. It needs more weight in the front to keep it from wobbling. When you walk it without your it wobbles too. It needs weight My dog does love it. If you know the solution. Lmk thanks It looks great. I got the black.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Well made in general but a few security flaws
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Works great for two small dogs. When I can open the front and let them feel like they aren't in jail, they don't mind so much being in it. But if I have to contain them, they stick their heads out the side and, if they were smaller, could probably squeeze out. And they have tried pushing their noses into the space at the top of the back zipper to unzip it. But as long as I pay attention, i feel like it's a good way to take them out and keep them safe. Folds and unfolds easily and I just keep it in my trunk.
customer_reviews.author: MizzM

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: My almost 15 year old Pekingese loves her stroller and is all smiles when we take it out. So far I have only taken her out for short walks but for longer walks I will probably fold up a blanket to put in the stroller for a little more cushion. The front wheels wobble a bit but nothing I can't live with. For the price I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl J.

customer_reviews.title: Zipper issues
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have purchased this stroller. The zippers are not strong. Must be VERY gentle with them. I thought the first time that a child had gotten hold of mine at the groomers, but now I wonder if it was just that the zippers were so flimsy. Stroller is very nice and easy to operate. Perfect for my two dogs. Just watch the zippers. Update : June 9, 2017. Stroller is very cute but the zippers do NOT hold up. I had to dispose of the second one I bought as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kutsmail1

customer_reviews.title: A great convenience for two small dogs
customer_reviews.text: Fits two Shih Tzus totaling 23 pounds. They love to go for a ride and are quite alert. We use it in crowded places, when they can't walk any furthe,r and when visiting friends in big apartment buildings. It seems sturdy yet light weight and folds up quickly. It was a great price on Amazon. We all like the mesh vents and I like the cup holders and storage beneath.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best dog stroller for the price by far
customer_reviews.text: For the price this stroller is fantastic for pets. It has a clip inside to keep your pet in place. Very sturdy construction and has top to keep your pet out of the sun. For the price, the quality of the stroller is equal to pet strollers that cost at least double. People have complained about the wheels and I understand that because the wheels are hard plastic. The are fine for smooth surfaces but for the price of the stroller they are good and what you should expect. My dog absolutely loves this stroller
customer_reviews.author: John DTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good for cats walks!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this stroller is very durable. I like that there's a basket at the bottom so I can put my kitties leashes, bowls, and food if I'm going on longer walks. My cats and I live in an apartment, so I'm trying to get them used to going for strolls and getting some fresh air. They seem to like it, as they peek from out the basket (with the mesh still zipped on to prevent them from jumping out), and it looks snug. I have three cats and they all fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Asia

customer_reviews.title: Chillin' With Evee B!
customer_reviews.text: Evee loves her first stroller!!! She's kind of a chill dog and loves being a doggie of leisure. This is her first stroller and thinks its grand especially with the pink/white polka dots. Evee loves the super comfortable ride. Now she can go to alot of cool places with the family. I'm sure she loves to be able to see mom right thru the back screen mesh. Her dad had no problem putting it together and before she knew it, she was enjoying her ride. Wheels are a good size too! This stroller is perfect for 5 yr old Evee. She weighs 14 lbs and has plenty of room. Her friend, Tucker, also liked the ride!
customer_reviews.author: Paula319

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller, and so does my dog! He has short little legs that get tired after a while, so I take it on walks, and when he gets tired, I pop him in his stroller and we keep going. He loves sitting there watching the world go by, and it keeps him safe when we're in a high traffic area. He's a chubby little pug mix, weighing in at 18 pounds, and this is the perfect size. The storage underneath, and the drink holder also come in handy. Easy to steer, and good on all the terrains we've encountered. Great stroller!
customer_reviews.author: Chris L.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable with Respectable Quality
customer_reviews.text: The product came 90% assembled, which was excellent. Just had to snap the wheels on and it was good to go. The wheels themselves feel like a cheaper plastic material, so if you'll be walking over gravel or anything like that you may have some wear and tear. My dog absolutely loves it though. For the price you pay, I'd definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Adam S.

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this
customer_reviews.text: So I have two small dogs (chihuahua & chiweenie) and they fit in here perfectly, both at the same time! The bottom is incredibly spacious so it’s nice for when you’re shopping or if you carry a lot of dog toys. I like how many openings there are so your dog can see through the front and back & they can see you from the top as well. However... the zipper stopped working for the front area pretty early on which is an absolute bummer since I loved this so much! :( I would recommend it just watch out with the zippers.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Check features of stroller before ordering
customer_reviews.text: It's just OK. It was easy to put together but there are some things that I don't like. It's kind of flimsy. I added a cushion on the bottom because there wasn't much support. The first day I used it one of the black snaps on the part that holds the dog broke off. The only place to put objects in is underneath. It would have been better if there was also a pocket on the back under the cup holder. The worse feature is the zipper on the front screen. The zipper for some reason is in an awkward position, making it difficult to zip it. I should have spent more for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: DC Florida

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite stroller...
customer_reviews.text: This stroller was a pain to assemble. Instructions for front wheels were poor leaving me to wonder if i popped them in right and i cant get them off so oh well i guess. Dont like the maneuverability of the front wheels at all. Thank goodness i will only be using it for vet visits. Two small dogs barely fit comfortably. I cant be bothered to return it after the aggravation of assembling it.
customer_reviews.author: drefinnej

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and functional!
customer_reviews.text: The stroller arrived mostly assembled and I just had to apply the wheels. No tools required although I did have to use pliers because I couldn't grasp the pin-fasteners when attaching the rear wheels. Once assembled the stroller has mesh openings on the top and also two areas on the front. My 6# and 10# shih tzus fit comfortably inside with room to lie down (as long as your dogs like each other!) the enclosure zips up completely or can be pulled all the way back to fully expose the area where the dogs sit. It also collapses easily for storage. I have yet to test it on outdoor terrain, but it appears pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Easy to put together... absolutely no problems there. The only thing is the frontal screen on the canopy. It does not have any zipper or snaps so if you hanve a pet that tends to lunge or try to jump out I wouldn't suggest this one. What I love is that like most that I have seen that has been reasonably priced this has the height that is really nice. I don't have to bend down, I have a back injury so this works really well. Absolutely too cute... love it! Oh and shipping.... came in just a few days. Gotta love Amazon Prime!!
customer_reviews.author: Cherryblossom

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for my cat, nice & open, has all the bells & whistles
customer_reviews.text: We love this stroller. Our cat can’t wait to jump in and be off! It rides fairly smoothly, offers plenty of views, has cup holders & a basket underneath, and is large enough that he can move around in it. We take him for long walks, to his delight and that of friends and neighbors. The assembly of the wheels/brakes was a little challenging, but certainly not difficult. I would definitely recommend this stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Gryseels

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this stroller. Our girls absolutely love riding around in it. It has 2 clips to clip them in so you can leave it open so they can see our but they can't jump out. Or you can make it all enclosed. It makes it easy to take your small dogs to festivals, fairs etc without getting stepped on. Everyone we come across thinks they are the cutest riding around in their stroller. It was easy to put together too. The basket on the bottom is great for your stuff and their stuff. For reference our girls are about 8lbs and 15ish lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 13 year old dachshund!!
customer_reviews.text: My fiancee and I bought this for our 13 year old dachshund because we want to go on walks but our fur baby can't keep up for that long and she gets tired fast. It is PERFECT for her and she LOVES it. I love all the mesh around the stroller so you can see what's going on inside. We put her blankets in it and snuggle her down for our winter walks. The wheels aren't as sturdy and durable as I would like but this stroller is perfect for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Galloway

customer_reviews.title: It alright.... Its nice..
customer_reviews.text: It's alright my dog likes it. The only thing I don't like is that one of the front wheels falls off every once in a while and I really don't know why. It doesn't really swivel like id want it to. i physically have to pick it up and maneuver it the way I want.... but i mean it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Bryttney

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control (package came missing parts)
customer_reviews.text: Edit: customer service replied and is supposedly sending me the missing parts, will update the review when they are received I would have liked this product if it wasn't clearly missing the parts (washers and pins) that keep the back wheels in place. They were specified in the manual but missing in the product I received, which leads me to believe they're repackaging returns. Without these it's impossible to even get the stroller out the front door without having the back wheels slip off, and god forbid you have stairs. The product otherwise seems nice but this issue with missing parts renders it useless overall - my cats certainly don't appreciate having it suddenly lurch backwards.
customer_reviews.author: Helen H.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice stroller 👍
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stroller for my little Chipin fur baby. I absolutely love it. The downside though is that the wheels don’t push so smooth on certain types of floors such as carpets and some linoleum floors. It pushes great on side walks. I don’t know about grass since I don’t have no need to push my baby in any grass. But other than that it’s a great stroller for your little fur babies.
customer_reviews.author: Ivykygirl718

customer_reviews.title: Good stroller, easy to collapse and travel with and has lasted over a year with no issues!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this stroller for my cat over a year now. We have used it for many of our travels and it has been the best! It folds, it's easy to maneuver, and I can lock the wheels when I need it stand still. There is also a leash lock inside to secure to my cats collar so she can't jump should she be so inclined to do. I can put the screen down, or open it up. It's really great when we go on our cat therapy visits. I recommend it to any pet owner looking for an easy way to transport their pet along with them!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria E. Tripp

customer_reviews.title: Best stroller ever
customer_reviews.text: Best stroller ever! My dog loves it. He's an 11 pound 14 year old pom who recently had a stroke. This was the cure! I took him out daily and it really revived him. He's almost back to normal; walks a bit on our walks, just next to the stroller...he stops and looks at the stroller when he's tired. It's light, very portable, well built, and has storage for water and snacks. Also a hood to shelter from the sun...and you can contain them in it with a zipper close in netting. Perfect! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: april milliken

customer_reviews.title: Pet Stroller
customer_reviews.text: This item was fine but I personally ordered it by mistake. I did not want a stroller for my cat I simply wanted a carrier that I could take my cat to the Vet or Groomer in. This item was simply too large and bulky for my needs and for me to handle as a senior. I am sure it would be great for someone who wants to walk their pet.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene L. Spiegelman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for simple strolls in the neighborhood
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t looking for anything extensive because we don’t do jogs together or anything like that. My pug and I enjoy walks along the sidewalk and after reading and reading the reviews on all the affordable priced carriages I decided to get this Vivo. The wheels are perfectly fine as far as turning and easy going walks go. Assembly was simple and most importantly it’s safe for my baby. Thumbs up thanks vivo wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Steer Straight
customer_reviews.text: After loving the same company’s similar model, but with a single wheel in front, I’m VERY disappointed with this purchase. I had to replace the first one after much use for almost 2 years in NYC and over rugged terrain on a recent road trip. I decided that this model with two front wheels should be even better. However I was dismayed to find it pulls hard to the right side whenever I’m pushing it and it’s so difficult to steer. Do yourself a favor and get the other design. It’s a great accessory for small pets that benefit from being transported by stroller.
customer_reviews.author: janey

customer_reviews.title: Great little Stroller!
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were easy to understand. It's easy to fold and put in the closet when not is use. Had some trouble putting the cup holder on though.. I didn't like the placement of the leads so sewed my own on which works great. Love the green color. Looks like many others do too! My 5 and 6 pound dogs enjoy the ride.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Definitely think twice before your purchase
customer_reviews.text: The zippers are very cheap and I'm disappointed with it since this pet stroller was not cheap. So far we are making it work because it would be a pain in the *** to take apart, pack up and send back. The rest of the stroller has been so far so good, and a perfect fit for my 7-8lb full grown Havanese, who is highly allergic to fleas and certain types of grass (so we avoid taking her for walks but she likes to go with our other dog and now she can!)
customer_reviews.author: R. R.

customer_reviews.title: Wheels go in every direction except straight.
customer_reviews.text: Its very cute and would have been great if i could actually use it easily. I only used it once and the wheels were going in every direction except straight. My arm was hurting from me having to course correct it all the time. Felt like a very cheap product and not user friendly. Second time i took it out if the trunk the wheels just fell off.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent stroller
customer_reviews.text: I got this stroller for my 5lb chi and it was shipped fairly fast. Pretty easy to put together you just have to put on the wheels. I was worried the wheels would suck but they are not to bad. Same thing with the mesh i thought it would be crappy mess that nails could rip through but i was surprised to get a rubbery mess. All in all not bad but we will see in time how well it holds up. We got this mainly so her feet dont burn walking on this hot ground here in Texas with temps still close to 100.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Harralson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but it works well for our rabbits
customer_reviews.text: We've only used this once so far to take one of our rabbits for a "walk," and he enjoyed it, with room to move around. One of the back wheels came off just as we were getting home from a 30 minute walk, but it was easy to pop back on. I believe I assembled it properly, but it could have been user error. The design isn't perfect. The bottom zipper is a little difficult to operate and the cup holders are far too small (in diameter and depth) to be of much use. On the plus side, it was easy to put together, operated smoothly, and the storage area underneath was wonderful. :) I am contemplating buying a second.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product for the price. My 11lb Schnoodle loves riding around in it and I feel confidant that she won't get out PLUS is has A TON of room in it! My only complaints are that it does not have a tie in strap, so for my own piece of mind, I keep the mesh zipped shut and that the bottom tray holder just loops on but doesn't have anything to really hold it secure. Also, I would not recommend this if you plan on going on trails or any rough terrain. For the price, I 100% recommend this stroller. It's well made, looks nice and is perfect for small dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Nagnot

customer_reviews.title: Front wheels are horrible.
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty disappointed. I bought this stroller for for my pug. The front wheels bounce, twist and won't roll smooth if you walk faster than snail speed. It is super hard to zip up all of the openings. The zippers come completely off and you have to re-thread them every time you open up a zipper. You just have to remember to not un zip them all the way. It assembled super easy and there is plenty of room for my dog and his blanket. He can lay or sit. He seems to like it a lot. It folds easy. Just bummer front wheels!
customer_reviews.author: Utah mom

customer_reviews.title: I’m so happy with it it was so easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I was a little hesitant to get the stroller because I have two medium size dogs I originally wanted it for one of them but I’m so happy with it it was so easy to put together they both Fit and they both love it. The dogs are both approximately 13 pounds. I just tried folding it for the first time and it is so easy
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this! Totally worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! Totally worth the money, especially since PetCo has the exact same one for twice the amount. I was kinda stunned at that. The only issues I had with this was it was missing a pin that attached to the wheel assembly so I had to improvise and use twine instead, which in turn means one of the front wheels remains slightly lifted off the ground. My cats love this though! I recommend using the harness that is inside, or they can find their way out the sides of the stroller if they really want to escape (loud noises)
customer_reviews.author: PandabearManda

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my kitten who’s been dying to go outside, she’s not crazy about it (yet!) but I’m very satisfied with the product. The zippers work good and it’s secure and very easy to push, it’s like a normal baby stroller
customer_reviews.author: Cipriana M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice stroller for the price...
customer_reviews.text: My two cats LOVE the stroller, one of whom likes to sleep in the little basket area underneath. It was easy to assemble (putting the wheels on) but the wheels themselves are little stiff/hard to roll, which is why it garnered 4 instead of 5 stars. Otherwise it's well made, sturdy and as I said, the "kids" love it! They can also both fit into it side-by-side which was a concern as they're both pretty hefty.
customer_reviews.author: L. Vitro

customer_reviews.title: Our dog does great in this and the product has been a real ...
customer_reviews.text: Never ever thought I would buy a stroller for a dog, but owning a Shih Tzu changed all that. Our dog does great in this and the product has been a real lifesaver. Lets us take her along for so many day trips that she would otherwise have to stay home and miss. No complaints at all about the function or quality of the product. Easy to put together and easy to fold down and back up.
customer_reviews.author: Eric L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Yorkie likes it
customer_reviews.text: We need to walk around the neighborhood for our health but our Yorkie is too little to walk for very long. We bought this so he could go with us. He seems to like it fine. The zippers are easy to use and he has many windows to look out of.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN  MESSICK

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: On time, as expected, made well, easy to put together & appropriately packaged. Absolutely love the color! So bright, happy & fun. I have a 3 lb Brussels Griffon puppy. He'll only grow to be as big as 12 lbs, so this stroller fits him perfect. I will only use it for traveling, walking him out in public but not for running or anything off road. It would not be suitable for that. The reason for 4 stars is because the left front wheel doesn't touch the ground all the way. However, it doesn't appear to interfere with the strolling.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Priest

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to get...
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this, Both of my Yorkies fit in it with lots of run to spare. It was so easy to put the wheels on and go . I would like to see sturdier wheels but for the price it was so worth it and both my boys enjoy being in it.
customer_reviews.author: M.Fields

customer_reviews.title: Great pet stroller
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is awesome. I have only used it once...but it seems sturdy. I had my 10lb chi and 4lb chi in there not problem and with plenty of room for them to move around and lay down if they wanted. They LOVED riding around PetsMart. It's simple to open and break down...and it comes fully assembled minus the wheels. Which are easy to get on. I haven't found any defects in the fabric or the zippers. Will update if needed once I use this more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vivo Stroller
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller, had a bump at first. I recieved this delivery missing the back axle. I was a little panicked because I did not want to return it. I called vivo directly to check on getting the part I needed. I spoke with Nicki, a customer service rep and she was great ! I recieved the part I needed in 3 days ! I had it put together in minutes. Love it !
customer_reviews.author: Colleen H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice stroller for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Nice stroller for the cost. Large wheels make it easy to steer, great for pavement, takes bumps with ease, and does well on grass. The straps (2) with hook, keeps dog securely in stroller. Zippers are a bit flimsy, but not a problem for me, since it is unnecessary to use netting. Stroller cover provides shade for your pup.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: (1) the unit moves well and has a good turning ability
customer_reviews.text: Pros: (1) the unit moves well and has a good turning ability; (2) there is a soft handle for gripping; (3) the sunshade, cupholders, and bottom baskets are actually useful; and (4) the stroller as a whole seems to be fairly durable. Cons: (1) the handle is not adjustable, so anyone 6 feet or taller will likely have a sore back from bending over; (2) the wheels are plastic, which means any imperfection in the surface will greatly affect the ride quality; and (3) the small wheels cannot easily traverse divots in the pavement/sidewalk.
customer_reviews.author: Timberwolvesatnj

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t not buy again, cheaply made wheels
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and holds up well. The wheels on the other hand are not great and one of the front wheels falls off. The wheels are cheap and don’t glide nicely and can make it a little bit of a struggle. I would honestly go for another stroller. I emailed the company about the wheels and they never responded.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Scheidler

customer_reviews.title: Great dog walker!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to go on long walks with my small Maltese and this was the perfect solution. Really good quality, cute as can be, space for everything I needed for a long walk, simple to put together, and my dog who is a little anxious, went right into it and seemed to really enjoy the ride! She was able to look out of the mesh on all four sides, with the top up I could pull back a bit of the top cover to be able to clearly see her inside, and I can't wait to take her on long interesting walks where we could not go before! Love this really cute and very serviceable item!
customer_reviews.author: WHIMSY GIRL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small service animal
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this one after buying the "amazon choice" and sending it back because it was crap. My daughter has a support dog, and when she goes to a large event (like a convention) walking the little Pomeranian/Terrier is dangerous for the dog. She uses this instead to protect the dog, carry supplies and control her dogs environment in strange places. Lightweight, easy to fold and reasonably priced (especially compared to retail pet stores!).
customer_reviews.author: Brady in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Light and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife, so I wanted one that was easily collapsible and light. This was perfect. There is even a peep hole one the top and from the back, so that we can watch our pet and they watch us. We sneak in our pet to all the stores and with a black mesh covering the front, store security cannot really see in and stop us. Love this carriage. I would highly definitely recommend this to everyone. Surprisingly the price was very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Master

customer_reviews.title: Great for small dogs or cats
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this stroller so our cats could go on walks and see something other than the inside of the house. They liked it inside and thought it made a great kitty bed. Unfortunately, they did not like it when we zipped it closed and took them for a walk. They got out immediately, when we got home. Fortunately, a friend's small older dog loves his stroller, so it was a win, after all!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley McCann

customer_reviews.title: The stroller is nice for my use
customer_reviews.text: The stroller is nice for my use, however my determined cat was able to easily push his way out of the side of the stroller which I did not anticipate (attached by velcro). Luckily we were inside rather than out. Please keep this in mind as you use it. I suggest attaching a short leash to your pet and the stroller to prevent any dangerous situations from happening near the street. Nice stroller for the price and very sturdy. I am quite happy with it and if not for the velcro issue would give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Widow Jenn

customer_reviews.title: well built
customer_reviews.text: easy assembly, sturdy, rolls and steers well. Not excessively heavy but we have to fold it and carry it down fifteen steps to the sidewalk ( and back up later ). We also added a tote bag. It carries our older, small dog when she gets tired and she does seem to enjoy the ride.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo

customer_reviews.title: A carriage for Royalty, oh I mean a spoiled puppy!!
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this dog carriage to anyone with a smaller dog. We have a 14 pound little cutie who does not like to walk as far as me (4-6 miles per day) and I do not like carrying him. He sits up on the carriage like royalty and I use the underneath to carry my phone, dog bags, water for both of us and more. This carriage is everything I had hoped for. Love, love, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Linda L Ware

customer_reviews.title: Great Carrier
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! It serves the basic function of holding my dogs and allowing me to carry items in the bottom basket - which is really all you need. I have used it a few times already both on grass and cement, and it has worked perfectly well. For size reference: I am able to fit both my 13 and 14 lb miniature pinschers in there. They fit snugly but comfortably. You will most likely have to put a little blanket or pillow on the bottom so that your dog is comfortable since the padding does not have much cushioning. Otherwise, everything else is great!
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: but the basket is very useful. Super cute and allows our pug to come ...
customer_reviews.text: My 17 lb senior pug loves to ride in this. She's blind and I thought she'd be squirmy in this but she loves coming with me on my jogs and walks. The only complaint is that my two coworkers and I could not get the drink holder attached to save our lives, but the basket is very useful. Super cute and allows our pug to come with us on our "for exercise" walks, which her little legs can't handle.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hunt

customer_reviews.title: My little "Lucky" absoloutley LOVES his new stoller!!
customer_reviews.text: Wanting to buy a stroller for my older dog so he can be comfortable and safe while also enjoying some fresh air while mommy takes her power walks was very important to me. Purchasing this stroller for him was one of the best desicions I've ever made, we're having a BLAST!! The only thing I'd change is better mobility with the front tires as they have to be facing a certain way in order to move.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Picetti

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an open box item so I didn't expect it to be perfect. It's missing the cup holder, I can live without that. It's missing the bar that holds the back wheels on!! So there is no way to attach the wheels. And it's missing the release so you can't fold it down. I don't even know how I can return it because it won't close up. I'm extremely disappointed in Amazon for this. No where did it last these defects that make the stroller unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney B

customer_reviews.title: rolls great
customer_reviews.text: this is the best pet stroller - especially if you are trying to conceal your pet. I have used this for everything where I needed to take my dog - rest stop bathrooms when it was too hot to leave them in the car and the restrooms wouldn't allow pets.... works great and dog loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: It serves it’s purpose for the price. My dogs broke the zipper first time in it. Sometimes the front wheels are just a little difficult to get going. All in all, I like it. I love to take my two toy poodles to farmer’s markets and such places, so this works out great. We have two homes. I have one at each home.
customer_reviews.author: TAM D

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is good for people literally taking leisure walks on pavement- that is all. It is not as durable as I had hoped. As far as the size and design- it’s great. My dog is 20lb miniature golden doodle and fits fine, she loved it. However, when I attempted a light jog the front wheel almost wobbled off. I’ll be buying another, more durable stroller- but this one will due for walks in the meantime.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Very good stroller!
customer_reviews.text: My small dog loves this stroller.... he gets excited as soon as I say we are going to walk. He is afraid of other dogs, and this is the perfect solution... I get the exercise, and he gets to be outside away from other dogs. I am short, so I wish the handles were adjustable - at times my arms get tired of having the handles up higher than I am comfortable with, but that small inconvenience would not deter me from purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware - Front Wheel Assembly on VIVO 4 Wheel Pet Stroller
customer_reviews.text: The directions for the front wheel assembly say "To install the front wheel, insert wheel onto the leg until a "click" is heard. That's all. The instructions don't say anything about not being able to get the wheel assembly off of the leg if it is inserted incorrectly. So, I have one wheel assembly correctly installed and one that I can't remove so that I can install it correctly. I have e-mailed VIVO for their suggestion as to how to correct this problem. If I can't get the one wheel assembly off in order to replace it correctly the item is unusable. I will update this review to let you know their response.
customer_reviews.author: K M

customer_reviews.title: A must have for aging or anxious little dogs!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest idea. My dog is getting old and can't walk as much as used to. This is great when on family walks and the dog gets tired. This is also used for social events as my dog is small and gets anxious on floor level. The security of being safe in the stroller is just what my dog needed. The functionality of the stroller is made just for dogs. They love to peek through the bottom zipper opening. And it functions like a stroller with the cup holder and bottom extra carrying space. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but good comments about this stroller
customer_reviews.text: It has been a year later and this stroller is still holding up! I got this for my 12 years old minpin chihuahua. I appreciate the four wheels instead of the three like most of the other strollers have. It feels more balanced and stable when rolling her around in it. People ask me all the time where I got this stroller from and I always refer them to this product!
customer_reviews.author: Laura M.

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I am really not happy with is the wheels
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I am really not happy with is the wheels. I don't think they will hold up for very long since they appear to be just plastic and not rubber. Other than that the construction is just fine. I do think that better wheels would certainly improve the ride experience for the pet. My older Pomeranian had tummy issues right after we started out. I am not sure if it was from the rough ride or the neighbors dog barking at us...:-(
customer_reviews.author: T. Grice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for trips to the store. Pup loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My mom bought this for her Chiweenie and they both love it! Her dog jumps in all by herself even when they're not going somewhere! Not sure about the complaints I read before purchasing but my mom only takes her pup shopping not for long walks. Also as you can see she doesn't fall over if she's in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: My cat loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My cat angel loves this stroller she will jump in when ever she wants to go on a walk! I live on a dirt road and I was very surprised on good it was on the road. It was very easy to put together and very spacious. Front wheels do turn weirdly but it’s not to bad. For the price it’s one of the best out there!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Lyn

customer_reviews.title: The makers have thought of everything!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for an 18-yr old blind miniature dachshund. The makers have thought of everything - multiple openings make for easy cleaning and versatile accommodations no matter what your dog's personality (partially opened for the more sedate dog, fully zipped closed for the safety of the more rambunctious dog; the wheels make for easy transport over rough surfaces and sand; it collapses for easier storage; the basket below makes a convenient catch-all (wipes, brush, poo-bags); I rarely use the cup-holders and the center tray won't accommodate an iPhone 7 or larger. Oh, and the price is very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Anna M Cabot

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for doggy
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a 2-3 years and it's amazing! My dog is 19lbs and fits perfectly with room. It has saved my life a few times. It's great for gatherings if u need to keep your dog in the same place. I've went to festivals and even work. It closes up like a real stroller. The bottom holder has ripped but not a big deal. I would recomend it even knowing that the zipper broke soon after, but I just tie a blanket around it if I need her to stay in.
customer_reviews.author: princessraquel

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise a nice option for taking your pet with you
customer_reviews.text: The only problem with this stroller is the front zipper. If you unzip it all the way to the end, it is very hard to put it back together. If you don't have a place to secure a runaway pet while you work to put the zipper back together--very frustrating. Otherwise a nice option for taking your pet with you.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Washington

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is adorbs and my cat doesn’t mind it at all and she looks adorable in it! Haven’t had very long so I can’t say anything on longevity or anything but I think it’ll for sure serve it’s purpose
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

product_meta.title: VIVO Black 4 Wheel Pet Stroller for Cat, Dog and More, Foldable Carrier Strolling Cart (STROLR-V001K)
feature_bullets: PET COMPARTMENT - Large protective space with zipper access points for ease of use
CAPACITY - This pet stroller is able to hold any pets weighing up to 30 lbs
MESH WINDOWS - Allow pet to see while in the pet compartment as well as providing ventilation to ensure pet’s safety and health during use
STORING STROLLER - Collapsible stroller folds up easily to prevent hassle and to save space
STORAGE - Dual cup holders, center tray, and spacious basket underneath all provide convenient placement for extra items while you take your pet for a walk in the park or shopping at the store
